metadata.Title: CVE-2020-7656 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: jquery prior to 1.9.0 allows Cross-site Scripting attacks via the loadmethod. The load method fails to recognize and remove "<script>" HTML tagsthat contain a whitespace character, i.e: "</script >", which results inthe enclosed script logic to be executed.

criterions.comment: jquery: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
